https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ilDWxhLnCzS1mjDBEGS9U8woAUX.jpg Daniel Crane is an American civilian engineer working to rebuild war torn Iraq who is kidnapped on his last day in Fallujah. Beaten and alone he is hostage caught up in the drama of war. A Message from Fallujah
